thread.title: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides
thread.title_full: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides

title: Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides
text:
> Top News Doris Duke mansion in New Jersey can be razed, panel decides FILE - In this Sept. 20, 2015 file photo, a large stable with a clock tower is surrounded by fencing during restoration at Duke Farms in Hillsborough Township, N.J. The Hillsborough Township Historic Preservation Commission ruled on Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, that the historic mansion on the Duke Farms property in central New Jersey can be demolished. (AP Photo/Mel Evans, File)
